params._assetType: a type hash, all returned assets will have this assetType
a type hash, all returned assets will have this assetType

returns.defined: true if the attribute is defined for this token
returns.value: attribute value, may have to be cast into some other type

isFlareAsset(address).details: All other methods that accept token address will fail if this method returns false

allAssets().notice: Returns the addresses of all Flare Assets

allAssetsOfType(bytes32).notice: Returns the addresses of all Flare Assets of given type.

allAssetsOfTypeWithSymbols(bytes32).notice: Returns the addresses and associated symbols of all Flare Assets of given type.

allAssetsWithSymbols().notice: Returns the addresses and associated symbols of all Flare Assets

assetBySymbol(string).notice: Returns the address of the Flare Asset with the selected symbol

assetType(address).notice: Return the asset type of the token. Asset type is a hash uniquely identifying the asset type. For example, for wrapped native token, the type is `keccak256("wrapped native")`, and for all f-assets the type will be `keccak256("f-asset")`.

getAttribute(address,bytes32).notice: Returns a generic asset attribute value.

incentivePoolFor(address).notice: Returns the incentive pool address for the selected token

isFlareAsset(address).notice: Returns if the token is a Flare Asset

maxDelegatesByPercent(address).notice: Returns the maximum allowed number of delegates by percent for the selected token

supportsFtsoDelegation(address).notice: Returns if the Flare Asset supports delegation via IVPToken interface
